body.p: This quiz assesses understanding of the fundamental concepts introduced in Part I: Introduction to DITA.

div.p: 1. What is the primary goal of structured authoring?

ul.li: a) Add more images to documents

li.b: b) Enable consistent, reusable, and scalable content creation

div.p: 2. Which of the following is NOT a core principle of DITA?

ul.li: b) Separation of content and format

div.p: 3. How does DITA support multi-channel publishing?

ul.li: a) It restricts output to PDF only

li.b: c) By separating content from presentation

div.p: 4. Which business challenge does DITA's content reuse capability primarily solve?

li.b: b) Duplicate content maintenance across multiple documents

div.p: 5. When should an organization typically choose DITA over simpler markup formats like Markdown?

ul.li: a) When they have only one publication target
b) When their content is primarily narrative rather than procedural

li.b: c) When they need advanced content reuse, conditional publishing, or professional multi-format output

ul.li: d) When they want to minimize their toolchain complexity

div.p: You have answered 0 out of 5 questions correctly.
